File_Description: File-level metadata associated with dataset. This file is an updated version (version 3) of the file-level metadata file.
Data dictionary defining column headers and other terms across the dataset. This file is an updated version (version 3) of the data dictionary file.
Miscrosoft word document for the determination of Method Detection Limits (MDLs) for DIC and NPOC data.
PDF document for the determination of Method Detection Limits (MDLs) for DIC and NPOC data.

Location information for the sites containing data. This file contains both Location_IDs and the latitude and longitude measurements associated with the Location_IDs. Latitude and longitude measurements are in WGS84 format.
File containing mean values for dissolved organic carbon (DOC) in milligrams per liter (mg/l). Asterisk marks Location_ID for which the location the data is collected from.

File containing mean values for dissolved organic carbon (DOC) analyzed as non-purgeable organic carbon (NPOC) in milligrams per liter (mg/l). Asterisk marks Location_ID for which the location the data is collected from.
